description.h2: The xsd:element substitutionGroup attribute must equal 'xbrldt:dimensionItem' if and only if the name attribute ends with 'Axis'.
description.p: REMARK: This only applies to company extension schemas, although it does hold for all standard taxonomies other than the ICI 2006 taxonomy. The ICI 2006 taxonomy can only be used with EX-100 attachments, to which rules in Chapter 6 do not apply.

variation.name: 6.7.23, dimension with name not ending in Axis, NOGOOD.
variation.description: dimension with name not ending in Axis, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.23, abstract with name ending in Axis not a dimension, NOGOOD.
variation.description: abstract with name ending in Axis not a dimension, NOGOOD.
